general_info.summary: This document outlines various programs and departments within Sharda University, including the School of Dental Sciences, School of Medical Sciences & Research, and Sharda School of Nursing Science & Research. It also lists key reports and initiatives such as Examination Annual Report, Academic Bank of Credits (ABC), Curricula Feedback, and University Brochure. Additionally, it covers aspects like university history, leadership, statutory bodies, tenders, legal documents, COVID-19 information, counselling services, capacity development, skill enhancement, language and communication skills, soft skills, technology trends via IIC, entrepreneurship, innovation, and the university's FM Radio station, Suno Sharda-90.8FM.

other_info.summary: This document provides a list of various departments, initiatives, and important information related to Sharda University. It covers areas such as recruitment, academic programs like those focusing on banking, postal services, leadership, and skill enhancement (language, soft skills, technology awareness), as well as student support services like accommodation, visa guidelines, medical insurance, and counselling. It also mentions specific portals like Paramarsh, entrepreneurial activities, and career prospects with indicative salary packages.
